scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:output && pnpx shx rm -rf node_modules
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm test:e2e:basic && pnpm test:e2e:handlers && pnpm test:e2e:reducers && pnpm test:e2e:redux && pnpm test:e2e:custom
scripts.test:e2e:electron-zustand-basic: cross-env APP_DIR=e2e-electron MODE=zustand-basic pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e:electron-zustand-handlers: cross-env APP_DIR=e2e-electron MODE=zustand-handlers pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e:electron-zustand-reducers: cross-env APP_DIR=e2e-electron MODE=zustand-reducers pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e:electron-redux: cross-env APP_DIR=e2e-electron MODE=redux pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e:electron-custom: cross-env APP_DIR=e2e-electron MODE=custom pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e:tauri: echo 'Tauri E2E tests temporarily disabled' && exit 0
scripts.test:e2e:tauri-v1: echo 'Tauri V1 E2E tests temporarily disabled' && exit 0
